title: CIBB2025: HPCAIG Special Session - High Performance Computing for AI-driven Genomics
description: Join us at the 20th Conference on Computational Intelligence Methods for Bioinformatics and Biostatistics (CIBB2025) for our special session ''HPCAIG - High Performance Computing for AI-driven Genomics''. Taking place September 10-12, 2025 at Politecnico di Milano, this session will explore cutting-edge applications of high-performance computing in AI-driven genomic analysis. Our HPCAIG session represents a unique opportunity to discuss scalable computational approaches for genomic data processing and analysis.
